::Shadow Wing::

She heard a sound that was like thunder and felt the ship rock. The 
lights on the ship flickered. 
"What in the inferno was that."
She got up to check on the CR chamber that Lunarpine was in.  He was 
safe inside the chamber.
She ran to the entrance and saw a huge creator near the ark.  Debri 
was still falling to the ground from the explosion.
She stood there wide eyed for a moment. "What happened?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Koga Shuko/Unitron:
> 
> 
> 
> Unitron activated his wrist comm., being 100 ft from the Ark.
> "Koga Shuko," he said into hte comm. system, "It's been done."
> 
> <Excellent, Unitron.  I will commence plan Octavian Marcis De-La-
Rama>
> 
> ---
> 
> Koga Shuko sat at a console, pressing a series of buttons, 
chuckling madly.
> 
> ---
> 
> At the bottom of the crate, a bomb activated, not even bothering 
with a 
> countdown timer, exploded.  The power of the bomb was amplified by 
the fifty 
> kilos of liquid energon greatly, expanding the explosion from a 
normal 30 
> foot radius, to an 85 ft radius.
